name: Brinjal
description: Eggplant is a high-fiber, low-calorie food that is rich in nutrients and comes with many potential health benefits. From reducing the risk of heart disease to helping with blood sugar control and weight loss, eggplants are a simple and delicious addition to any healthy diet. They`re also incredibly versatile and fit well into many dishes. [Source: www.healthline.com] Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only.
